tasks.label: Quality Checks
tasks.command: uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff check --select I --fix . && uv run ruff format . && uv run mypy .

tasks.label: Coverage Report
tasks.command: uv run coverage run --omit=tests/* -m pytest && uv run coverage run --omit=tests/* -a -m pytest -m docker && uv run coverage html && uv run coverage erase
